comment.author: 51440179@N02
comment._content:
The first book of musical notation I bought was one of  Django's.
Perhaps I should have started with Bob Dylan.
I still can't play "nuages".  But i do know a G, C and a D chord.
Not Bad. Strange framing. Lovely 2 1/4 inch square negatives.
Who on earth framed it at the Library of Congress!
